name: js-games
description: I remember really wanting to learn how to make games when I was younger. This repo chronicles my expereince with game developement in JS. I wanted to start out with simple concepts and work my way into some fully functioning games. I also wanted to learn these concepts without using any game development libraries.

scripts.build-snek: lerna bootstrap && cd snek && npm run build
scripts.build-ping: lerna bootstrap && cd ping && npm run build
scripts.build-tetras: lerna bootstrap && cd tetras && npm run build
